data.meta_description:
3,050 likes, 28 comments - courtsidebuzzig on March 20, 2023: "Raymond Felton remembers his time with Jason Kidd in his final NBA season with the New York Knicks: 

‚ÄúHe would see stuff on the court & I‚Äôd be like, ‚Äòhow did you see that?‚Äô Then he‚Äôd explain to me what he was looking at. He taught me a lot‚Ä¶ he would help me with reads off pick & rolls. It was one of the most amazing years that I‚Äôve had in my career. It was fun. To see some of the stuff he was doing as he got older, shooting those threes like that, that was amazing, too.‚Äù 

Kidd at 39: 6.0 PPG, 4.3 RPG, 3.3 APG, 1.6 SPG, 35.1 3P%, 26.9 MPG, 76 of 82 games played 

Old dog J-Kidd was still an INSANE playmaker & a knockdown three-point shooter! üêê (FULL @inside_buzz interview with Raymond Felton in LINK IN BIO)".
